description: This file defines the FriendRequestRepository class which implements data access operations for FriendRequest entities, including CRUD methods and queries for pending requests and user-related requests within a backend application.

classes.name: FriendRequestRepository
classes.description: Repository class for managing FriendRequest entities, providing methods for querying and updating friend request data.

methods.name: GetByIdAsync
methods.description: Retrieves a FriendRequest by its unique identifier asynchronously.

methods.name: AddAsync
methods.description: Adds a new FriendRequest to the database asynchronously.

methods.name: UpdateAsync
methods.description: Updates an existing FriendRequest in the database.

methods.name: ExistsPendingAsync
methods.description: Checks if there is a pending friend request from one user to another.

methods.name: GetPendingForUserAsync
methods.description: Retrieves all pending friend requests for a specific user.

methods.name: GetAllForUserAsync
methods.description: Retrieves all friend requests related to a specific user.

methods.name: SaveChangesAsync
methods.description: Persists all changes made in the context to the database asynchronously.
